title: Game wont connect after champion select
body: if anyone can tell me how to fix the issue with lol not loading/connecting me to the game after champ select and reverting me back to the reconnect screen over and over it again it would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: We were having some slight login issues a bit earlier tonight, but they've since been ironed out. Let me know if you're still having this issue or not and I can help troubleshoot.

yes i have been having this issue for a week now. the only way i have found to fix it temporally is to reinstall the game, and this only works until i turn off my computer then i would have to reinstall it again just to let me get in to games
